mapper.select: Select COUNT(*) From board Where brd_md= #{brd_md} and brd_lg= 700

Select * FROM (Select rownum rn, b.brd_num, u.nick, b.title, b.reg_date, b.user_num, b.view_cnt From board b, user1 u Where brd_md= #{brd_md} and brd_lg=700 and b.user_num = u.user_num Order By b.reg_date DESC) Where rn Between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: Insert Into board (brd_num, user_num, brd_lg, brd_md, title, conts, view_cnt, reg_date, brd_group, brd_step) values (BRD_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{user_num}, 700, #{brd_md}, #{title}, #{conts}, 0, sysdate, BRD_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0)
mapper.select: Select b.*, u.nick From board b, user1 u Where b.brd_num = #{brd_num} and b.user_num = u.user_num

Select ROWNUM, a.* From (Select b.*, u.nick From board b, user1 u Where brd_lg = 700 and b.user_num = u.user_num and b.brd_md BETWEEN 100 and 103 and b.like_cnt is not null ORDER BY like_cnt DESC) a WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 and 5

SELECT b.*, user1.nick FROM board b JOIN user1 ON b.user_num = user1.user_num WHERE b.brd_md BETWEEN 100 AND 103 AND b.brd_Group = b.brd_num AND (b.title like '%' || #{srch_word} || '%' Or b.conts like '%' || #{srch_word} || '%') ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC
